about: I started my career as a Developer in 2018, as an intern after graduating as an Electronics Technician.
Today I work as Tech Lead at VetTech Soluções em Tecnologia, being responsible for project management and development
In addition to programming, I have practical experience with tax information and Business Management, and from studying I have knowledge in the area Finance and investments.

In my leisure time I like to practice Physical Activity such as going to the gym, watching series and films, and keeping up to date with the latest events in World of programming, in addition to studying the financial area and investments.
